definition: with one's own ears
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
parents-in-law of one's offspring
ear/handle (archaeology)/and that is all (Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: For this blessing there was a solemn form, but no mortal has heard it;
sentences.chinese: 过去还不曾有人类亲耳听到过这些庄严肃穆的祝福。

sentences.english: Is that true? Yes. I heard it with my own ears.
sentences.chinese: 那真实吗？是的，我亲耳所听。

sentences.english: I heard him say so with my own ears.
With my own ears I clearly heard the heart beat of the nucclear bomb.
sentences.chinese: 我亲耳清晰地听到原枪弹的心脏的跳动。

sentences.english: With my own ears Iclearly heard the heart beat of the nuclear bomb.
sentences.chinese: 我亲耳清晰地听到原枪弹的心脏的跳动。

sentences.english: Not sure how that'll sound in person, but it definitely raises an eyebrow.
sentences.chinese: 虽然实际效果只有亲耳听过才知道，但一定会非常棒。

sentences.english: With my own ears I clearly heard the heart beat of the  nuclear  bomb.
sentences.chinese: 我亲耳清楚地听到原子弹的心脏的跳动。

sentences.english: The vows, which have been exchanged by Jay and Ye, have been offered in our hearing.
sentences.chinese: 邹劼和王烨交换的誓言，我们已经亲耳听见。

sentences.english: For instance, to do something or hear yourself.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，亲手制作，亲耳听见。

definition: one's own mouth/fig. in one's own words/to say sth personally
to sound (old, foreign, exciting, right etc)/to ring (true)/to sound as if (i.e. to give the listener an impression)/to hear from somewhere
absolutely true (idiom)/manifold/true from many points of view
to pass on (stories)/to relate
to listen/to hear what sb says/news one has heard
news of sb's death
one side of the story/one-sided statement
actual situation/truth
without missing a word
to eavesdrop/to monitor (secretly)
to speak without thinking/to blurt sth out
to prick up one's ears/to strain to hear sth
a lie/untrue statement/misstatement
see 一字不漏[yi1 zi4 bu4 lou4]
just a word or two (idiom); a few isolated phrases
pleasant to hear (i.e. agreeable news)/to one's liking/music to one's ears/Taiwan pr. [zhong4 ting1]
